creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: golden coat; open front; all edges (cuffs, hem and neck/front) bound with commercial woven tape in turquoise, yellow, orange and hot pink; lined in hot pink brocade fabric; sleeves lined in white ticking type fabric striped red and blue; gold brocade outer fabric has floral pattern
dimension: 57 x 76 7/8 in. (144.78 x 195.26 cm) (width cuff to cuff)
title: Coat
